featured.text: The theory underlying it is that lying is stressful, and that this stress can be measured and recorded on a polygraph machine.
The team is beginning to test the GABA theory on mice.
The women’s softball team that won gold for Japan at the Beijing Olympics is reported to have used blood-type theories to customize training for each player.
It is difficult to comment conclusively on these theories in general, apart from saying that any and all of them might be possible.

other.text: The theory behind the questionnaire used in the Dognition test.

definition.zh_def: 理論；一套解釋或理解現象的原則或觀點。
definition.en_def: A system of ideas intended to explain something, especially one based on general principles independent of the thing to be explained.
definition.example: The theory of evolution explains how species change over time.
